sentences.sContent: Thee first "standard" battleship of the Tech Tree armored according to the "all or nothing" concept.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thee first "standard" battleship of the Tech Tree armored according to the "all or nothing" concept.
sentences.sCn: 第一艘按照觨“全有或全没有”的理念进行装甲设计的标准级别战列舰。

sentences.sContent: When I see these articles I always remember the German Tiger 1 that attacked an entire armored column, alone.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I see these articles I always remember the German Tiger 1 that attacked an entire armored column, alone.
sentences.sCn: 当我看到这类型的文章时，我总是会想起德国虎1坦克独自攻击整个装甲纵队的情景。

phrases.pCn: n. 钢筋混凝土；钢筋水泥

words.tran: 武装的；有扶手的；有防卫器官的（指动物）
